OrgName.entry: STOCKSBRIDGE CONNEXIONS CENTRE NEETS (NOT IN EDUCATION, EMPLOYMENT OR TRAINING)

Desc.entry: Runs a drop-in on Mondays for young people who are out of work, offering careers and education advice, and a school group on Tuesdays, working with children and young people who are under-achieving in school.

ContactName.entry: Kevin Seaman, Worker in Charge/Jackie Prachek/Norman Side, Youth Workers

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Tues, Thurs & Fri 9am-2pm (office times); Mon 1-3pm (drop-in), Thurs 8.30am-3pm (school group)

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
